messages.title: This election is our chance to change Britainâ€™s future
messages.content: Only the Lib Dems are fighting to stop hard Brexit and the Conservatives are dragging the country towards a hard Brexit that will devastate the future of Britain.

messages.title: Help Joe win and stop hard Brexit
messages.content: Join the local Lib Dem team to secure the strong opposition this country needs.

messages.title: LABOUR: TOO WEAK TO FIGHT FOR YOU
messages.content: "Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition." - The Guardian, 19 Feb 2017

messages.title: LIB DEMS ARE THE REAL OPPOSITION
messages.content: The Tories can't win in Hackney, it's Lib Dem or Labour here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are fighting to keep Britain in the single market and secure a referendum on the final Brexit deal.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Tories can't win in Hackney, it's Lib Dem or Labour here.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Lib Dems are fighting to stop hard Brexit. Lib Dems are fighting to keep Britain in the single market.

housing.content: Lib Dems will build more council homes and fix damp, poor quality homes to make sure everyone has a place to call home.

endorsements.endorsement: Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition.

quotes.text: "Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. He is unfit to be called leader of the opposition."
